mapper.select:
SELECT aa.* FROM( SELECT a.ifcgSeq, a.ifcgName, a.ifcgUseNy, a.ifcgOrder, a.ifcgDesc, a.ifcgDelNy, a.ifcgRegist, a.ifcgEdit, (SELECT count(ifcdSeq) FROM B_code AS b WHERE 1 = 1 AND b.B_codegroup_ifcgSeq = a.ifcgSeq) AS xifcdSeqCount
ORDER BY a.ifcgSeq desc ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMySql}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_codegroup ( ifcgName, ifcgUseNy, ifcgOrder, ifcgDesc, ifcgDelNy, ifcgRegist, ifcgEdit ) VALUES( #{ifcgName}, #{ifcgUseNy}, #{ifcgOrder}, #{ifcgDesc}, 0, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.ifcgSeq, a.ifcgName, a.ifcgUseNy, a.ifcgOrder, a.ifcgDesc, a.ifcgDelNy, a.ifcgRegist, a.ifcgEdit FROM bears.B_codegroup a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE bears.B_codegroup SET ifcgName = #{ifcgName}, ifcgUseNy = #{ifcgUseNy}, ifcgOrder = #{ifcgOrder}, ifcgDesc = #{ifcgDesc}, ifcgDelNy = #{ifcgDelNy}, ifcgEdit = now() WHERE 1 = 1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
UPDATE bears.B_codegroup SET ifcgDelNy = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
